title: WhatsApp Cloud API Settings
content: Synchronize your WhatsApp Cloud API account with the configuration settings.
title: Cloud API settings
content: Synchronize your WhatsApp Cloud API account.

title: WhatsApp Cloud Numbers
content: Add and manage the details of WhatsApp phone numbers for API integration.
title: Cloud API numbers
content: Add WhatsApp phone number details here.

title: WhatsApp Cloud Template Fallback
content: Set up a WhatsApp Template notification to be sent in case the WhatsApp message fails. Use merge fields such as {conversation_url_parameter}, {recipient_name}, and {recipient_email}.
title: Cloud API template fallback
content: Sends a WhatsApp Template notification if sending of the WhatsApp message fails. You can use text and the following merge fields: {conversation_url_parameter}, {recipient_name}, {recipient_email}.

title: Test WhatsApp Template
content: Send a WhatsApp message template to a phone number for testing.
title: Test template
content: Send the message template to a WhatsApp number.

title: SMS Fallback for WhatsApp
content: Send a fallback SMS if the WhatsApp message sending fails. Use merge fields like {conversation_url_parameter}, {message}, {recipient_name}, and {recipient_email}.
title: Text message fallback
content: Sends a text message if sending of the WhatsApp message fails. You can use text and the following merge fields: {conversation_url_parameter}, {message}, {recipient_name}, {recipient_email}.

title: Order Webhook URL
content: Specify the URL to which WhatsApp order details will be sent.
title: Order webhook
content: Send the WhatsApp order details to the URL provided.

title: WhatsApp Catalog Configuration
content: Set up your WhatsApp catalog details for products and services.
title: Catalogue details
content: Your WhatsApp catalogue details.

title: Twilio Settings for WhatsApp
content: Enter your Twilio account details to configure WhatsApp integration.
title: Twilio settings
content: Enter your Twilio account settings information.

title: Twilio WhatsApp Template Settings
content: Configure WhatsApp Template notifications for Twilio integration. Use merge fields like {conversation_url_parameter}, {recipient_name}, and {recipient_email}.
title: Twilio template
content: Sends a WhatsApp Template notification if sending of the WhatsApp message fails. You can use text and the following merge fields: {conversation_url_parameter}, {recipient_name}, {recipient_email}.

title: 360dialog WhatsApp Settings
content: Configure your 360dialog account to manage WhatsApp integration.
title: 360dialog settings
content: Enter your 360dialog account settings information.

title: 360dialog Template Configuration
content: Set up WhatsApp templates for 360dialog integration. Merge fields like {conversation_url_parameter}, {recipient_name}, {recipient_email} are supported.
title: 360dialog template
content: Sends a WhatsApp Template notification if sending of the WhatsApp message fails. You can use text and the following merge fields: {conversation_url_parameter}, {recipient_name}, {recipient_email}.

title: Disable Chatbot for WhatsApp
content: Disable the chatbot specifically for the WhatsApp channel.
title: Disable chatbot
content: Disable the chatbot for this channel only.

title: Clear WhatsApp Flows
